desc.en: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.jp: Akane apologizes to Neru for her failures, but Neru is more interested in how Aris managed to go toe-to-toe with the Maid Club. Back at the club room, the Game Development Department tries to use the Mirror to decrypt G.BIBLE.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 战斗后，茜对任务失败一事向尼禄道歉，但尼禄却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 战斗后，朱音对任务失败一事向宁瑠道歉，但宁瑠却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 战斗后，茜对任务失败一事向妮露道歉，但妮露却反而表示，对和女仆部打得不相上下的爱丽丝感兴趣。另一方面，回到社团活动室的游戏开发部一行人试着使用<镜子>解读<G.Bible>。

desc.en: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone being humiliated. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to grab all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.jp: Akane apologized for accepting the request and making everyone being humiliated. Neru said the request was cancelled, and she was interested in Aris in particular. She instructed Asuna to grab all the information about the Game Development Department.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 茜为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，尼禄则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。尼禄对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 朱音为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，宁瑠则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。宁瑠对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 茜为接下该项委托给大家蒙羞抱歉，妮露则表示大可不必，并表示委托已被取消。妮露对爱丽丝特别感兴趣，让明日奈等人去查清游戏开发部全员的资料。

desc.en: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.jp: The 27th track in Blue Archive, used especially when the player loses the battle.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第二十七首曲子，尤其用于玩家输掉一场战斗后。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The Game Development Department received the latest result from the Veritas. Everyone started to read, but was greatly disappointed by the book's content.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department received the latest result from the Veritas. Everyone started to read, but was greatly disappointed by the book's content.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人收到了真理社最新的提取结果，众人立刻开始阅读。但书中内容令众人大失所望。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人收到了贝里塔斯最新的提取结果，众人立刻开始阅读。但书中内容令众人大失所望。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人收到了真理会最新的提取结果，众人立刻开始阅读。但书中内容令众人大失所望。

desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第64首曲子，于“游戏开发部”相关章节中广泛使用。其已经成为游戏开发部及其成员实质上的标志性曲目。
